1.text: This is the book of the generation of Adam. In the day that God created man, he made him to the likeness of God.

2.text: He created them male and female; and blessed them: and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

3.text: And Adam lived a hundred and thirty years, and begot a son to his own image and likeness, and called his name Seth.

4.text: And the days of Adam, after he begot Seth, were eight hundred years: and he begot sons and daughters.

5.text: And all the time that Adam lived came to nine hundred and thirty years, and he died.

6.text: Seth also lived a hundred and five years, and begot Enos.

7.text: And Seth lived after he begot Enos, eight hundred and seven years, and begot sons and daughters.

8.text: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years, and he died.

9.text: And Enos lived ninety years, and begot Cainan.

10.text: After whose birth he lived eight hundred and fifteen years, and begot sons and daughters.

11.text: And the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years, and he died.

12.text: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begot Malaleel.

13.text: And Cainan lived after he begot Malaleel, eight hundred forty years, and begot sons and daughters.

14.text: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years, and he died.

15.text: And Malaleel lived sixty-five years, and begot Jared.

16.text: And Malaleel lived after he begot Jared, eight hundred and thirty years, and begot sons and daughters.

17.text: And all the days of Malaleel were eight hundred and ninety-five years, and he died.

18.text: And Jared lived a hundred and sixty-two years, and begot Henoch.

19.text: And Jared lived after he begot Henoch, eight hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.

20.text: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred and sixty-two years, and he died.

21.text: And Henoch lived sixty-five years, and begot Mathusala.

22.text: And Henoch walked with God: and lived after he begot Mathusala, three hundred years, and begot sons and daughters.

23.text: And all the days of Henoch were three hundred and sixty-five years.

24.text: And he walked with God, and was seen no more: because God took him.

25.text: And Mathusala lived a hundred and eighty-seven years, and begot Lamech.

26.text: And Mathusala lived after he begot Lamech, seven hundred and eighty-two years, and begot sons and daughters.

27.text: And all the days of Mathusala were nine hundred and sixty-nine years, and he died.

28.text: And Lamech lived a hundred and eighty-two years, and begot a son.

29.text: And he called his name Noe, saying: This same shall comfort us from the works and labours of our hands on the earth which the Lord hath cursed.

30.text: And Lamech lived after he begot Noe, five hundred and ninety-five years, and he begot sons and daughters.

31.text: And all the days of Lamech came to seven hundred and seventy-seven years, and he died.

32.text: And Noe, when he was five hundred years old, begot Sem, Cham, and Japheth.
